thread.title: Japan: PlayStation 4 Tops Chart After Price Cut
thread.title_full: Japan: PlayStation 4 Tops Chart After Price Cut - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: Japan: PlayStation 4 Tops Chart After Price Cut
text: The PlayStation 4 home console has managed to post a tenfold increase in its sales numbers on the Japanese market, taking the number one position in the hardware chart while managing to deliver no less than 46,177 units to its fans. The major improvement comes after the price of the device was cut by the team at Sony in order to make it more attractive during the coming months. For the week that ended on October 4 data from Media Create Quote: d by Â»
